title: Fintech Daily Brief — 2026-01-20
summary: Today’s brief spans Payments & Banking, Markets & Macro, Fraud & Risk, Regulation. Momentum is building across core fintech rails while risk and policy themes tighten execution. Expect continued focus on speed, compliance readiness, and resilient operations.

blocks.what_happened: Major issuer pilots instant card-to-bank payouts for gig workers; Open-banking API volumes rise as SME lenders expand; Cross-border payments see faster settlement via tokenized deposits.
blocks.why_it_matters: These moves signal shifting priorities for fintech operators and their partners.
watchlist: Major issuer pilots instant card-to-bank payouts for gig workers
Open-banking API volumes rise as SME lenders expand
Cross-border payments see faster settlement via tokenized deposits
Card networks update dispute rules for merchant-friendly timelines
